thread.title: AOA’s Seolhyun Reveals What She Purchased With Her Hard-Earned Money
thread.title_full: AOA’s Seolhyun Reveals What She Purchased With Her Hard-Earned Money

author: kminjungee
title: AOA’s Seolhyun Reveals What She Purchased With Her Hard-Earned Money
text:
Pin   
During her appearance on the January 2 episode of JTBC’s “Please Take Care of My Refrigerator,” AOA’s Seolhyun touched on many topics such as her salary and her diet (or lack thereof) . 
While she mentioned she doesn’t really know how to use her earnings, Seolhyun revealed how she did spend a part of her money. 
“I bought an air conditioner for our house, and bags for my parents. As for myself, I like to collect tumblers so I spent a little adding to my collection,” she said. 
The idol explained that she just ended up saving the rest and showed her humble, filial side.
